rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual anticipation ('anticipate... detections will occur') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports anticipation of future detections but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes ongoing surveillance ('wild bird surveillance continues') as capability/preparedness without active reassurance.
